channel.title: Mrugank Milind Akarte
channel.description: Recent content on Mrugank Milind Akarte

item.title: Q-Learning
item.description: Q-Learning Q-Learning is a value based reinforcement algorithm. The idea is that we create a Q-Table which has all the states represented as rows of Q-table and actions as columns.

item.title: Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Introduction Reinforcement learning is a type of machine learning problem which is solved using the past experiences and interactions of the agent with the world.

item.title: Toxic Comment Classifier
item.description: This project is based on Kaggle Competition: Toxic Comment Classification Challenge
